replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ⊙v⊙ 于 2019-4-15 00:59 编辑 

我来说一下槽点....
"Developed by Swedish company, Mojang Minecraft was firstly designed as ..."
明显Mojang与Minecraft之间缺了个句号。

"Minecraft was firstly designed as a house-building game."
然而并不是，而是洞穴，挖掘，探险。

"One needs knowledge about architecture, building materials and math while playing the game which ..."
绝大部分情况和数学没什么关系...needs knowledge about的need好像太绝对，整句意思改为gain knowledge反而会更好。

71.
A错位置
C错数字
D使用了all,错在过于绝对(除非文中明确提到为all)

理应选B，然而并没有所谓的new Minecraft，印象中也几乎没有人这么去描述教育版mc，只有Minecraft: Education Edition。故此题无解...
